topic.title: New Alt Media as A New Norm {Protestant}
topic.body:

Naysayer will say "they're just protesting for a while, if the situations is fixed they'll go back to the 'main fascist platform' again"
My response as always "No, until something able to be punished - they'll more likely repeat the abominable actions. We're not just a protestant."
*We should make new social media more convenient to use, to give yet-to-move user more attractions.

topic.title: He also got impersonated, wouldn't have known if not using : invidio.us or tube.poal.co
topic.body:
I just notice today, that brother nathanael (http://brothernathanaelchannel.com/watch_video.php?v=N7AN3SYUN89R) are censored and outright deleted by Youtube (2 days ago). He never advocated violence and just stating the truth. If I have no invidio.us/tube.poal.co, I would hadn't known about this.

If you don't know about Br.Nathanael, he's just one of the rarest jewish christian who live in the monastery in the US. Constantly giving amazing content in which moral value preserved. Hated by the judaism-jews the most of course. He's basically commenting around crucial-secular topics, like war - economy - etc. 'The message before the messenger.'

Sorry for spamming twice today.

1560227102_1D7aG9GPhaCuEEiGRQpUZGZkMQVEG.body:
Excuse in this post-truth era is just f*rt, you can't believe everything gov said.
IMHO if there's any people involved in this war, it's only Saudi & Iran. These 2 big boy are always against each others (sunni-shia | oil monopoly, etc), US are only interested in profit (if any, let the war spread far to control vital pipeline) and mitigate collateral damage to their dollars (oil price too high, collapse will be faster). Some of my patron, geopolitics savy said, US actually no need to involve deeply in this fight. Let those two fight by themself, it's never involving USA to begin with. It only happens that "Jared Al Arabia" trumps son-in-law known tightly connected to Saudi via Israel connection. Arab Saudi is only a shishkebab they're too lazy and only count on their pocket money in contrast with Persian Iran which is hardwork-oriented, because many sanctions given to them by US.

And also commenting to Iran might attack other country, it wouldn't happen. Russia - although not so close with Iran - will not let that happen. 

this might need further research, only to share my tiny thought about this.

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_224_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): Americans rejoice, you will pay 'for another war again'.What could be more pleasing and educational, to go and invade another country because you are unable to produce 'a Proper economy'. [...]

Yea, it's so sad the people there is really dumbed down: can't even decide to choose 1 BTC or 1$, so sad.

> [sheendocks](#comment_46_1P4KkC3wa5xtGD8m2MoBTf5p69G3Xr4aCU): Iran, DPRK, and Venezuela. Iran has IRGC, DPRK has a huge army and China on its side, what does Venezuela have except backing from Cuba? Venezuela is at the top of the hit list I'm afraid but they'll keep pushing for a peaceful overthrow first and then resort to war if that fails. Hopefully, Russia will step in if Venezuela is attacked but no guarantee.

Russia obviously will step in, it's all about oil price. Russia's total export dominated by energy by nearly up to 70%, if you follow the news US are known to always (orchestrating) sabotaging the oil price (when they need money the most). And btw don't say US as biggest oil producer by now, it's fracking oil which is  environmentally hazardous, hi-risk and output will only be lower and lower in near future. Venezuela is the new project of 'petrodollar rebirth' and as goes in Syria in last 2018, that's the Russia's bottom-line, Putin will go crazy if US too much meddling there. Remember BRICS? US has sabotaged Brazil and Ru-Cn just let it go ... but Syria (pipeline), Venezuela (petrodollar-rebirth) and Iran (as Belt&Road nodes) are crucial for the next multipolar world project.

> [asabiyyah](#comment_2_1D7aG9GPhaCuEEiGRQpUZGZkMQVEGRga9H): I don't believe that profit is a serious motivator for the Americans. It seems to me they really exist solely to die for Israel. I'm sure Iran would have gladly played nice in the interantional economy if America had kept up it's end of the nuclear deal. This would have allowed america to accomplish it's strategic interest, stable oil output, with lower troop commitment and simultaneously freed up soldiers to use to threaten China. I don't advocate for aggression either but that seems to me to be something that is legitimately in the interest of the US. War with Iran seems to only be in the interest of Israel.

New news here : *Now Trumps want to talk with Iran*
here's why : http://thesaker.is/why-trump-now-wants-talks-with-iran/

Little digress: Yes, I'm sure american are enslaving themself to Israel die-heart-ly. Still I can't find the reasons why?
And I only know from Ron Paul he once said that middle-east was to be dominated by Israel to establish the hegemony and reasons of west to be part of asian continent. Zbigniew Brezinsky has doctrine about eurasia, which if I'm not mistaken whoever rule it will rule 'the entire world' - economically - and another continent could just be forgotten from civilizations. Maybe the target is banishing 'anti-american' sentiment, but that's hard it's like trying to erasing memory from humanity.

closing: 
Old world is dwindling and dying out, their rampant meddling by their covert operations has come to an end. Without dollar to support where could you go to work? Manipulations of stock market will come to an end. Time to start the industry machine again for real.

Next candidate: 
+ thinkspot : at least patronized by JBP, he stake his credibility on this site.
+ PJW's one: watch his new video, he want to create one too https://www.bitchute.com/video/nn-Qj8HC3sg/

-----
Here's what I think, it's all about money, energy and content {MEC}:
+ I think the problem is never with social media itself, but the bank & the medium incentive 2be given to the people. 
+ The people itself = the center of our interest, you can create random website and successful only if the 'MEC' is safe and has constant output. Youtube now is only exist because of privilege to be the first, has a payment system and has a lot of content, imagine if there's a new website to guarantee the payment and all the creators boycotting youtube, deleting the content there/ at least hide from the users, limit new video if published in youtube and move & promote theirs in that other site? They can still safe keep their content using content id (preventing reupload), that's a lotta damage!
> btw youtube is now I can say the most shameless creature we can observe in the world. Biased algorithm, changing-as-they-want kind of rule, erasing evidence when deleting channel, anti critique, etc.
+ Also about new MEC, if there's a smart guy with a backing out there: create the new one! Let the big company rotting itself in the entertain-them-tube and let small creative company creating ads on the new intelligence and free speech supportive group. Big companies will fall in the end and in the end demographics matters.
+ but actually it doesn't matter, content creator can also create ads agency by them-self. And this trends maybe surging up in the future and put the coffin to the Goolag Adsense, the things that most creator - afraid of.
+ and also there's is threat from smear-merchant-mainstream-media that should be addressed, by bulletproof forum-site, to let point 4 works well.

Maybe this is just out of topics,
sorry for my broken english.

If you're in surveillance state better to always use facade: 
1-3 real seen connections to random websites (which is 'logical' for a long time browsing)
other (real one) as encrypted connections

+ use dnscrypt to hasten your load avoid dns hijacking
+ use startpage.com as it will encrypt the search query | you can load url anonymously there.

Also you can try, buy 1 flashdisk 32gb, then try to install linux (ubuntu mate 18.04 amd64 is good) on pendrive (not as live cd) and use them as daily driver. Install vpn and crucial data there. Easy and quick to hide.
